key.uiDescription: Swim more quickly! Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff5f5f'>20</font> stamina per sec. Press a direction key to swim.
Navigate steep walls freely. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff5f5f'>20</font> stamina per sec. Press a direction key to climb.

Float into the sky holding balloons, ascending <font color='#ff8ae5'>1.5</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>2</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Float into the sky holding balloons, ascending <font color='#ff8ae5'>1.7</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>2</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Float into the sky holding balloons, ascending <font color='#ff8ae5'>1.9</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>2</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Float into the sky holding balloons, ascending <font color='#ff8ae5'>2.1</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>2</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Float into the sky holding balloons, ascending <font color='#ff8ae5'>2.5</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>2</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Grab tightly to a trained eagle that ascends <font color='#ff8ae5'>0.5</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>7</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Follow the call of an angelic being to ascend <font color='#ff8ae5'>4.8</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>1</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Hang onto a flickering incandescent bulb that ascends <font color='#ff8ae5'>2.1</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>2.2</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Grab onto the leg of an alien trying to board their UFO and ascend <font color='#ff8ae5'>1.3</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>6.3</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Grab onto a powerful missile to ascend <font color='#ff8ae5'>2</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>30</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>2</font> m per sec with an acceleration of <font color='#ff8ae5'>350</font>. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Grab onto a massive, powerful missile to ascend <font color='#ff8ae5'>0.5</font> m every sec with an acceleration of <font color='#ff8ae5'>100</font>. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>1</font> m per sec with an acceleration of <font color='#ff8ae5'>200</font>. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Glide gracefully upon an immaculately folded paper plane and slowly descend from the sky. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>8.6</font> m per sec. You can only use this skill while jumping or airborne, and you cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Perch atop a state-of-the-art drone that ascends <font color='#ff8ae5'>0.5</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>3.9</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Slowly descend from the sky atop a snowflake. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>4.8</font> m per sec. You can only use this skill while jumping or airborne, and you cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Create a mountable rune that ascends <font color='#ff8ae5'>0.5</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>30</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>4.5</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>7</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Hang onto a cute duck that ascends <font color='#ff8ae5'>2.1</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>2.2</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Mount a cute slime that ascends <font color='#ff8ae5'>0.5</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>10</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>3.9</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.

Perch atop an orange maple leaf that ascends <font color='#ff8ae5'>0.5</font> m every sec. Hold down the key to sustain your movement, which consumes <font color='#ff8ae5'>20</font> stamina per sec. Press and hold a directional key to propel yourself <font color='#ff8ae5'>7.3</font> m per sec. You cannot use this skill indoors or in certain restricted regions.
